俾.definition: to cause; to enable; phonetic bi; Taiwan pr. [bi4]

俾使.definition: in order that; so that; so as to; to cause sth

俾夜作晝.definition: lit. to make night as day (idiom); fig. to burn the midnight oil; work especially hard

俾斯麥.definition: Bismarck (name); Otto von Bismarck (1815-1898), Prussian politician, Minister-President of Prussia 1862-1873, Chancellor of Germany 1871-1890

俾晝作夜.definition: to make day as night (idiom, from Book of Songs); fig. to prolong one's pleasure regardless of the hour

俾路支.definition: Balochi (ethnic group of Iran, Pakistan and Afghanistan)
